string-array.item: Check and edit students attendance
Check and edit attendance by date
Take attendance for today
Learn how to use this app

string-array.name: help_options_title_for_list_view
string-array.item: How to take attendance?
How to check attendance of a specific date?
How to change attendance of a specific date?
How to check attendance of a particular student?
How to add a student?
How to delete a student?

string-array.name: help_options_descriptions_for_list_view
string-array.item:
1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Take Attendance" option and click it.
 note:if you haven't added students then when you click on the "Take Attendance" option it will take you to the place where you can add students.
 3.A screen will come up where you can click on the box if the student is present or not click on the box if the student is absent.
 4.Click on save.

1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Dates" option and click it.
 3.A dialog will appear where you can select your date.
 4.After selecting the date you click "ok".
 5.Then you will see a check box with the student names which you can view.
 note:You can't set attendance of a future date.

1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Dates" option and click it.
 3.A dialog will appear where you can select your date.
 4.After selecting the date you click "ok".
 5.Then you will see a check box with the student names which you can change by clicking it.
 6.Then click on save changes.
 note:You can't set attendance of a future date.

1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Students" option and click it.
 3.Then you will see your student's list,click on any student name of your choice.
 4.Then you will see a dialog which will show you all the students attendance history.

1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Students" option and click it.
 3.Then click on the "⋮" on the top right conner
 4.Then a dialog will appear where you can type the student name

1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Students" option and click it.
 3.To delete a student you have to long press on it and then a dialog will appear 
 4.Click on the "delete" option to delete student
